about.headline: Senior Full-Stack Developer (PHP / JavaScript)
about.bio:
Hi everyone ‚Äî I‚Äôm Giang (Vincent), a Senior Full-Stack Developer with over 6 years of experience building scalable, secure, and high-performance web applications for global clients.

üíª What I Do
I specialize in end-to-end web development, delivering clean architecture, efficient APIs, and polished user interfaces. I bring strong experience in e-commerce, SaaS, and enterprise systems ‚Äî with a focus on performance, maintainability, and UX.

üß† Key Skills / Tech Stack
Languages & Frameworks: PHP, Laravel, Symfony, JavaScript (ES6+), Vue.js, React.js
E-commerce Expertise: Shopware 5 & 6 (custom plugins, themes, integrations)
Databases: MySQL, SQL, PostgreSQL
Infrastructure: Google App Engine, AWS, Serverless architecture
Frontend Tools: HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Webpack
Practices: REST API design, clean architecture, CI/CD pipelines, agile collaboration

üöÄ Looking For
Freelance or part-time opportunities to design and deliver modern, maintainable systems, particularly in e-commerce or web-based platforms. I love solving technical challenges and collaborating in diverse, remote-first teams.

üèÜ Career Highlights

  • Delivered multiple Shopware 6 custom plugins for international retailers, improving checkout UX and performance.

  • Migrated legacy Laravel projects to modern architecture with containerization and CI/CD pipelines.

  • Designed multi-tenant SaaS features integrating secure APIs and serverless components on AWS and GCP.

  • Improved team workflows with automated testing and deployment pipelines, boosting release confidence and speed.

üïì Availability
Open for new freelance projects | Remote (UTC+7)

portfolios.title: GVKinLink
portfolios.summary:
A private space where your family connects, remembers, and grows together.
Build your family tree, share memories, and link generations ‚Äî forever.
portfolios.body:
A private family networking platform where users:

  • Build and visualize their family tree (with modern, interactive design).

  • Connect relatives (both close and distant) like a ‚Äúprivate Facebook for your family.‚Äù

  • Share photos, stories, milestones, or documents (weddings, heritage, etc.).

  • Manage heritage data (birthdays, death anniversaries, important family events).

  • Invite relatives securely, ensuring only family members can access.

Essentially:
üß¨ Ancestry.com + Facebook + Family Album, but private and modern.
